languages.text: {n}Простая истина, знакомая любому {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}пустотнику{/d}, заставляет что-то щелкнуть в голове Главного кормчего.{/n} "Я сбился... с курса? Плазменные торпеды мне в глотку, кто следит за приборами?! И почему я целюсь в..."

{n}This simple truth, known to any and all {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsmen{/d}, causes something in Ravor's mind to click.{/n} "I have... veered off? Blast me in the back with plasma torpedoes, who's watching the readings? And why am I aiming this thing at..."
languages.original_text: {n}Простая истина, знакомая любому {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}пустотнику{/d}, заставляет что-то щелкнуть в голове Главного кормчего.{/n} "Я сбился... с курса? Плазменные торпеды мне в глотку, кто следит за приборами?! И почему я целюсь в..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The simple truth known to any {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsman{/d} causes something in Ravor's mind to click.{/n} "I have... veered off? Blast me in the side with plasma torpedoes, who's watching the readings? And why am I aiming this thing at..."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Diese einfache Wahrheit, die allen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Raumfahrern{/d} bekannt ist, löst in Ravors Verstand etwas aus.{/n} "Ich bin ... vom Kurs abgekommen? Erschießt mich mit Plasma-Torpedos ... wer überprüft die Messwerte? Und warum richte ich dieses Ding auf ..."
languages.original_text: {n}This simple truth, known to any and all {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsmen{/d}, causes something in Ravor's mind to click.{/n} "I have... veered off? Blast me in the back with plasma torpedoes, who's watching the readings? And why am I aiming this thing at..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Diese einfache Wahrheit, die allen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Raumfahrern{/d} bekannt ist, löst in Ravors Verstand etwas aus.{/n} "Ich bin ... vom Kurs abgekommen? Erschießt mich mit Plasma-Torpedos ... wer überprüft die Messwerte? Und warum richte ich dieses Ding auf ..."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Cette simple vérité, connue de tous les {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}cosmomarins{/d}, provoque un déclic dans l'esprit de Ravor.{/n} « Je me suis... écarté du chemin ? Nom d'une torpille à plasma, qui se charge de surveiller les radars ? Et pourquoi suis-je en train de braquer cet engin sur... »
languages.original_text: {n}This simple truth, known to any and all {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsmen{/d}, causes something in Ravor's mind to click.{/n} "I have... veered off? Blast me in the back with plasma torpedoes, who's watching the readings? And why am I aiming this thing at..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cette simple vérité, connue de tous les {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}cosmomarins{/d}, provoque un déclic dans l'esprit de Ravor.{/n} « Je me suis... écarté du chemin ? Nom d'une torpille à plasma, qui se charge de surveiller les radars ? Et pourquoi suis-je en train de braquer cet engin sur... »
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Esta sencilla verdad, que cualquier {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}infante del vacío{/d} conoce, hace que algo encaje en la mente de Ravor.{/n} «Me he... ¿desviado? Que me lancen un torpedo de plasma a la popa, ¿quién está vigilando las lecturas? ¿Y por qué estoy apuntando esta cosa contra...».
languages.original_text: {n}This simple truth, known to any and all {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsmen{/d}, causes something in Ravor's mind to click.{/n} "I have... veered off? Blast me in the back with plasma torpedoes, who's watching the readings? And why am I aiming this thing at..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Esta sencilla verdad, que cualquier {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}infante del vacío{/d} conoce, hace que algo encaje en la mente de Ravor.{/n} «Me he... ¿desviado? Que me lancen un torpedo de plasma a la popa, ¿quién está vigilando las lecturas? ¿Y por qué estoy apuntando esta cosa contra...».
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}ヴォイズマン{/d}であれば誰でも知っているこの単純な事実が、ラヴォアの心に何かを刻み込む。{/n}「私が…航路を外れただと？私は背後からプラズマ魚雷で撃たれでもしたのか？計器を見ているのは誰だ？私は、どうしてこんなものを向けて…」
languages.original_text: {n}This simple truth, known to any and all {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsmen{/d}, causes something in Ravor's mind to click.{/n} "I have... veered off? Blast me in the back with plasma torpedoes, who's watching the readings? And why am I aiming this thing at..."

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}ヴォイズマン{/d}であれば誰でも知っているこの単純な事実が、ラヴォアの心に何かを刻み込む。{/n}「私が…航路を外れただと？私は背後からプラズマ魚雷で撃たれでもしたのか？計器を見ているのは誰だ？私は、どうしてこんなものを向けて…」
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}所有{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}虚空之子{/d}都知道这样的常识，你的话语在雷沃的意识中产生了共鸣。{/n}“我……偏离了航线？真该死，让等离子鱼雷炸死我吧！现在是谁在负责看读数？还有，我怎么会举着这玩意儿……”
languages.original_text: {n}This simple truth, known to any and all {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsmen{/d}, causes something in Ravor's mind to click.{/n} "I have... veered off? Blast me in the back with plasma torpedoes, who's watching the readings? And why am I aiming this thing at..."

traits.locale_text: {n}所有{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}虚空之子{/d}都知道这样的常识，你的话语在雷沃的意识中产生了共鸣。{/n}“我……偏离了航线？真该死，让等离子鱼雷炸死我吧！现在是谁在负责看读数？还有，我怎么会举着这玩意儿……”
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Tüm {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}uçsuz erlerince{/d} bilinen bu basit gerçek, Ravor'un zihninde bir şeylerin yerine oturmasına sebep oluyor.{/n} "Ben... Rotamdan mı saptım? Beni plazma torpidolarıyla yoluma sokun! Okumaları kim takip ediyor? Bir de neden bu şeyi hedef almış..."
languages.original_text: {n}This simple truth, known to any and all {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}voidsmen{/d}, causes something in Ravor's mind to click.{/n} "I have... veered off? Blast me in the back with plasma torpedoes, who's watching the readings? And why am I aiming this thing at..."
